abstract: Babak Hakakian, partner in high-end contemporary furniture company DDC, loves his high-concept loft overlooking Madison Square Park, where his wife and two children live in four adventurously designed spaces representing an element--earth, fire, water or air.

headline.main: A Partner in DDC Furniture on Living With the Elements

snippet: Babak Hakakian, a partner in a high-end furniture business, Domus Design Collection, lives near Madison Square Park with his wife and two children.
lead_paragraph: Babak Hakakian, a partner in a high-end furniture business, Domus Design Collection, lives near Madison Square Park with his wife and two children.
